title: iNaiyaDi unadai
sahitya:
iNaiyaDi unadai nAn paNinduyya vandEn taNikait-talam tigazh subrahmaNyanE


anupallavi

  tuNai tandu tolvinai anaittum aghalavE iNaiyillA vaghaiyil inbattai aLikkum
(or) aNaindadum aLavillA Anandam aLikkum tuNai tanden tollai anaittum aghalavE


caraNam    tinai aLavEnumE tIvinai aNugAmal aNuvaLavEnum ini allal urAmal
dinamtOrum undan tirunAmam tannai manamArak-karudi mahimai mighunda
